snippet: A federal appeals court struck down California’s ban on same-sex marriage, bringing this nation a step closer to full equality and fairness.
abstract: Editorial applauds the federal appeals court decision rejecting California's ban on same-sex marriage as unconstitutional; asserts that the ruling brings the country one step closer to full equality and fairness.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court struck down California’s ban on same-sex marriage, bringing this nation a step closer to full equality and fairness.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
